articles.title: Gravitas: Cellphone creator Martin Cooper regrets invention? - WION
articles.description: It has been 50 years since cell phones were invented. Today's smartphones pack more tech than initial NASA's Voyager I, Apollo 11 computers, Orion spaceship, etc. Are cell phones the greatest invention since the wheel? Molly Gambhir reports.
